item.description:
Some of you may be getting this late ... apologies ... but this Tuesday, December 8th we'd like to see how many biotech enthusiasts we can get together for our annual Boston Biotech Meetup holiday party.

This will be nothing but fun and networking.

Bring your business cards. Like last year we'll be raffling off a nifty "IAmBiotech" Flip video camera as well as some other IAmBiotech odds and ends.

And like last year we'll be meeting at the Cambridge Brewing Company, gathering at 6:30 and going until whenever.

Folks are on their own for covering any refreshments. And bring a friend if you can. Always more fun the more biotech folks we gather together.

Hope you can make it.
item.name: Annual Boston Biotech MeetUp Holiday Party
